00023 #ifndef _BOARD_H_
00024 #define _BOARD_H_
00025 
00026 /* This is the processor pinout and what is connected to each pin 
00027  * =====================================================================================
00028  * All the driver outputs are used as high for the output to be activated and
00029  * low to disable the output.
00030  * =====================================================================================
00031  * The external address input has got external pull up resistor which makes the 
00032  * address inverted. So if one bit is zero it means that the DIP is actually
00033  * switched to its on position.
00034  * =====================================================================================
00035  * 
00036  * JP1 header pinout (ISP header)
00037  * =====================================================================================
00038  * This header can be used either to program the device (pin compatible with AVR ISP)
00039  * or you can use it to communicate with other hardware devices via SPI. I would suggest
00040  * that you use PB4 in that case as the chip select pin.
00041  *
00042  *  -----
00043  * o|1 2|
00044  *  |3 4|
00045  *  |5 6|
00046  *  -----
00047  *
00048  *  Pin 1 = SPI MISO
00049  *  Pin 2 = NC
00050  *  Pin 3 = SPI SCK
00051  *  Pin 4 = SPI MOSI
00052  *  Pin 5 = uC RESET
00053  *  Pin 6 = GND
00054  * =====================================================================================
00055  *
00056  * 
00057  * PORTA
00058  * =====================================================================================
00059  * PA0  -       PTT input R4
00060  * PA1  -       PTT input R7
00061  * PA2  -       PTT input R3
00062  * PA3  -       PTT input R6
00063  * PA4  -       PTT input R2
00064  * PA5  -       PTT input R5
00065  * PA6  -       PTT input R1
00066  * PA7  -       Driver output #20
00067  * =====================================================================================
00068  *
00069  *
00070  * PORTB
00071  * =====================================================================================
00072  * PB0  -       
00073  * PB1  -       ISP SCK
00074  * PB2  -       
00075  * PB3  -       
00076  * PB4  -       Driver output #1
00077  * PB5  -       Driver output #2
00078  * PB6  -       Driver output #3
00079  * PB7  -       Driver output #4
00080  * =====================================================================================
00081  *
00082  *
00083  * PORTC
00084  * =====================================================================================
00085  * PC0  -       Driver output #11
00086  * PC1  -       Driver output #12
00087  * PC2  -       Driver output #13
00088  * PC3  -       Driver output #14
00089  * PC4  -       Driver output #15
00090  * PC5  -       Driver output #16
00091  * PC6  -       Driver output #17
00092  * PC7  -       Driver output #18
00093  * =====================================================================================
00094  *
00095  *
00096  * PORTD
00097  * =====================================================================================
00098  * PD0  -       I2C SCL
00099  * PD1  -       I2C SDA
00100  * PD2  -       BUS RXD
00101  * PD3  -       BUS TXD
00102  * PD4  -       Driver output #7
00103  * PD5  -       Driver output #8
00104  * PD6  -       Driver output #9
00105  * PD7  -       Driver output #10
00106  * =====================================================================================
00107  *
00108  *
00109  * PORTE
00110  * =====================================================================================
00111  * PE0  -       MOSI (ISP)
00112  * PE1  -       MISO (ISP)
00113  * PE2  -       External address input bit 0
00114  * PE3  -       External address input bit 1
00115  * PE4  -       External address input bit 2
00116  * PE5  -       External address input bit 3
00117  * PE6  -       Pos/neg sense input
00118  * PE7  -       
00119  * ===================================================================================== *
00120  *
00121  *
00122  * PORTF
00123  * =====================================================================================
00124  * PF0  -       PTT LED R1
00125  * PF1  -       PTT LED R2
00126  * PF2  -       PTT LED R3
00127  * PF3  -       PTT LED R4
00128  * PF4  -       PTT LED R5
00129  * PF5  -       PTT LED R6
00130  * PF6  -       PTT LED R7
00131  * PF7  -       Neg/Pos driver module sense input (0 = neg, 1 = pos), activate pullup
00132  * ===================================================================================== * *
00133  *
00134  *
00135  * PORTG
00136  * =====================================================================================
00137  * PG0  -
00138  * PG1  -
00139  * PG2  - Driver output #19
00140  * PG3  -       Driver output #5
00141  * PG4  -       Driver output #6
00142  * ===================================================================================== * *
00143  */
00144  
00145 #endif
